title: The Ultimate Seduction
description: The man was habit-forming!Liza Bradley knew that a nibble of chocolate recreated the feeling of being in love - her exclusive chocolate shop wasnâ€™t called The Ultimate Seduction for nothing. But it was bold Mac Davidson who tempted her with the real thing....Suddenly she craved delights she'd never dared to sample before...and faced risks she'd always avoided. Although she longed to savor their passion, Liza feared the pleasures Mac offered would be too sweet, too rich and almost impossible to resist.
author: Madeline Harper
